title: 93/201/EEC: Commission Decision of 11 March 1993 amending Decision 86/414/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Argentina approved for the purpose of importing meat products into the Community
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 11 March 1993 amending Decision 86/414/EEC as regards the list of establishments in Argentina approved for the purpose of importing meat products into the Community
(93/201/EEC)THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN  COMMUNITIES
main_body: The Annex to Decision 86/414/EEC is hereby replaced by the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 11 March 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 302, 31. 12. 1972, p. 28.
(2) OJ No L 173, 27. 6. 1992, p. 13.
(3) OJ No L 237, 23. 8. 1986, p. 36.
(4) OJ No L 91, 12. 4. 1991, p. 63.
ANNEX
LIST OF ESTABLISHMENTS
